article: A lot of us lose life s tough battles by starting a frontal attack when a touch of humor might well enable us to win. Consider the case of a young friend of mine, who _ a traffic jam on his way to work shortly _ receiving an ultimatum about being late for work. Although there was a good reason for Sam s being late serious illness at home he decided that this by-now-familiar excuse wouldn t _ any longer. His supervisor was probably already pacing up and down preparing a dismissal _ .Yes, the boss was. When Sam entered the office at 9:35, it was as _ as a locker room everyone was hard at work. Sam s supervisor _ him. Suddenly, Sam forced a grin and _ out his hand. How do you do! he said. I m Sam Maynard. I m _ a job, which, I understand, became available just 35- minutes ago. Does the early bird get the worm? The room burst into _ . The supervisor clamped off a smile and walked back to his office. Sam Maynard had _ his job with the only tool that could win, a laugh.Humor is a most effective, yet _ ignored, means of handling the difficult situations in our lives. It can be used for patching up differences, apologizing, saying no , criticizing, getting the other fellow to do what you want _ his losing face. For some jobs, it s the only tool that can succeed. It is a way to discuss subjects so sensitive that serious dialogue may start a quarrel. 36.
